column5: This is a beautifully decorated home! Owner is home, but you have access to a queen bdrm w/attached bathroom, lots of drawers and closet space, with TV, including HBO and Showtime! access to large eat in kitchen and Courtyard in the middle of the house- perfect for your morning coffee! Parking, shopping galore, restaurant Heaven, movies and comedy clubs!
column8: Luxurious MemoryFoam Queen Bdrm/Bath and Courtyard
